attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2005-1219

Date: 2005-06-23

                     Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice et en vertu de l’alinéa 3(2)a) de la Loi sur le Tribunal de la concurrence, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil nomme l'honorable Michael L. Phelan, juge de la Cour fédérale, membre du Tribunal de la concurrence pour un mandat de sept ans.


Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, pursuant to paragraph 3(2)(a) of the Competition Tribunal Act, hereby appoints the Honourable Michael L. Phelan, a Judge of the Federal Court, a member of the Competition Tribunal, to hold office for a term of seven years.

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, pursuant to paragraph 3(2)(a) of the Competition Tribunal Act, hereby appoints the Honourable Michael L.
